origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'EVChargingNetwork.get_network_map', 'description': 'Get the map of an electric vehicle charging network.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'network', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The electric vehicle charging network to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'network_map', 'description': 'A dictionary containing details about the network map.'}]}, {'name': 'EVChargingNetwork.get_revenue_models', 'description': 'Get the revenue models of different charging stations in the network.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'network', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The electric vehicle charging network to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'revenue_models', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing revenue models.'}]}, {'name': 'EVChargingNetwork.get_partnership_cases', 'description': 'Get case studies of partnerships in the electric vehicle charging network.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'network', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The electric vehicle charging network to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'partnership_cases', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing partnership case studies.'}]}, {'name': 'EVChargingNetwork.get_optimization_advice', 'description': 'Get optimization advice for the electric vehicle charging network.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'network', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The electric vehicle charging network to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'optimization_advice', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing optimization advice.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
获取电动汽车充电站网络的地图。接下来，获取电动汽车充电站网络各站点的盈利模式。然后，获取电动汽车充电站网络上下游企业的合作案例。最后，获取电动汽车充电站网络的优化建议，并获取潜在的发展机遇。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取电动汽车充电站网络的地图。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'network'的值是什么?

prediction: 当前工具的参数'network'的值尚未提供。请提供一个电动汽车充电网络的名称，以便我可以调用该工具。
